text: Merab Ilyich Chigoev (; 15 February 1950 - 9 January 2016 Labyrinth.ru: Profile of Merab I. Chigoev) was a South Ossetian politician. He was the former Prime Minister serving from August 1998 until June 2001.Rulers.org: South Ossetia He was also Minister of Justice in Yury Morozov's cabinet. Caucasian Knot: South Ossetian government directory He was born in Leningor district, South Ossetian Autonomous Oblast, Georgian SSR, Soviet Union. Chigoev was killed in a car crash in Tskhinvali, South Ossetia on 9 January 2016 at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Prime Ministers of South Ossetia Category:Politicians from Georgia (country) Category:Communists
title: Merab Chigoev
